com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.item

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.JsRegisteredClass
      • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.MinecraftClassWrapper
        • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.item.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AxeItem, BootsItem, ChestplateItem, FoodItem, HelmetItem, HoeItem, LeggingsItem, PickaxeItem, SpadeItem, SwordItem

    public class Item
extends MinecraftClassWrapper
    This class wraps around a Minecraft Item, allowing for the fields and methods to be accessed as well as allowing custom items to be created
    Author:
    pcr3w

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Item(net.minecraft.item.Item item) 
      Item(java.lang.Object o)
      Creates a new item with the properties from the provided Javascript object

      net.minecraft.item.Item _wrapped() 
      Item addDescription(java.lang.String desc)
      Adds the given String to the description of the item - for dynamic descriptions add an 'addDescription' function in the item properties

      • setUnlocalisedName

        public Item setUnlocalisedName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the unlocalised name of the item - used for textures. Don't call this as it is called automatically when an item is registered
        Parameters:
        name - The unlocalised name
        Returns:
        The item to allow for chaining
